intro: Gonostegia neilgherrensis, commonly known as the Himalayan sandwort, is a flowering plant native to the high altitudes of the Himalayas. It thrives in rocky, well-drained soils and is adapted to cold, arid environments. Gonostegia neilgherrensis is often found in alpine meadows and is valued for its ornamental appeal and ecological role in its native habitat.
